tool_description: Calculates knitting or crochet gauge measurements based on yarn weight, needle/hook size, and stitch dimensions to ensure proper fit and sizing.

yarn_weight.description: Yarn weight category (lace, fingering, DK, worsted, chunky, super chunky)

error_messages: Invalid yarn weight: Use one of [lace, fingering, sport, DK, worsted, aran, chunky, super chunky].
Invalid needle size format: Provide size as metric (4mm), US (US 6), or letter (H/8) format.
Unsupported craft type: Use one of [knitting, crochet, weaving].
usage: Provide yarn_weight, needle_size, and craft_type to calculate expected gauge measurements for your project.

stitches_per_inch.description: Expected number of stitches per inch

rows_per_inch.description: Expected number of rows per inch
